title: Name change
body: I was wondering if there was any chance that you guys at riot could remove the 69 from my name. I made this account when i was a freshman in high school and didnt think much about my decisions as a username. And i wouldnt want to pay 10$ just to remove 69.

replies.body: We can sometimes help with capitlization issues, but I'm not sure we'd be able to remove the numbers beyond using the store name change.  You can hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our team will see if we can make any exceptions.  :D
